resources.string: Add some widgets on your home screen and you will be able to see and edit them here.

Day Counter is licensed under the MIT license. More info here: https://goo.gl/cxRvtw

This app was programmed by Agustín Roth and designed by Agustín Roth and Christen Edmundson (Specially the last one. Thank you very much!). The idea came from a Reddittor's comment that has deleted their account.

Reddit comment: https://goo.gl/huVoro

GitHub repository: https://goo.gl/ZH6yv5
Are you counting the days since and event, or until an event?
How many days until/since the event?
You have to type something here
You have to select a kind of event
